name: .BZABW File Extension
summary: Learn about .BZABW files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A BZABW file is an .ABW document compressed with Bzip2 compression by AbiSource AbiWord, a free, cross-platform word processor. AbiWord users save documents as BZABW files to reduce the size of an ABW document for storage or transfer purposes.

content: AbiWord is an open-source word processor developed by members of the AbiSource community. AbiSource only actively develops the Linux version (since version 3) of AbiWord, while older versions of the application are also available for Windows and macOS.
Since ABW documents store information in the XML standard, they may grow large. To reduce the size of an ABW document, AbiWord allows you to compress it with Bzip2 compression.
NOTE: Various versions of AbiWord may also compress ABW files with gzip compression, resulting in a .ZABW file.
